caption:
Table 1: Performance comparison of our model and baseline methods using MPJPE (in 
millimeters) between the ground truth and estimated pose on Human3.6M under Protocol 
#1. The last column report the average errors, and boldface numbers indicate the best 3D 
pose estimation performance.
columns: Dire . Disc . Eat Greet Phone Photo Pose Purch . Sit SitD . Smoke Wait WalkD . Walk WalkT . Avg .
